content: Ladies and gentlemen, this is the operator. We're currently experiencing technical difficulties. We're currently experiencing technical difficulties. Consolidated financial margin reclines grew by 47.1%, boosted by higher revenues, especially of credits in Chile and Colombia as well as higher interest rates in both countries. Consolidated non-interest expense grew 9.7% year-over-year, while the efficiency ratio improved 11 basis points, reaching 7.8% in -- that consolidated -- the consolidated cost of credit increased 68.7% year-over-year from a very low base that we observed in the Third Quarter of 2021, which was positively impacted by the pension funds with Ross in Chile. Ladies and gentlemen, this is the operator. We're currently experiencing technical difficulties. We're currently experiencing technical difficulties. That's why, for instance, you see that the level that we have for credit lines in the balance sheet, we are -- I think the bank with the lowest growth in credit, retail credit lines overdraft lines in the next 12 months because we've been mixing our portfolio for a better cost of risk. Ladies and gentlemen, this is the operator. We're currently experiencing technical difficulties. We're currently experiencing technical difficulties.
